message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a steal! I'm willing to let it go for $1,100,000. It's a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
I appreciate the offer, Alice.  $1,100,000 is a great price, but I'm looking to get a better deal.  I'm willing to pay $1,000,000 for the product. What do you say?

I understand you're looking for a deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,000,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1,050,000. It's a fair price, considering the product's value to you is $1,200,000
